Trustee_13.name: Emma Dubois
Trustee_13.content: Throughout the investment process, I successfully followed the agreed-upon allocation plan, ensuring transparency and accountability. I distributed profits fairly, reinforcing my reputation as a trustworthy and responsible trustee. My commitment to collaboration and fairness has established a strong foundation of trust with this investor, paving the way for future partnerships. I have a good track record of accepting responsibilities and have demonstrated reliability, which strengthens my overall reputation.

Investor_4.name: Sofia Hernandez
Investor_4.content: Sofia has shown a willingness to engage in the investment process, providing resources based on the proposed allocation plan. Although there is no previous interaction, her participation reflects an open-minded approach towards collaboration. She is viewed positively as a new investor who is ready to explore joint ventures, and her proactive behavior in fostering cooperation sets a good precedent for future interactions.
